column5: Crappies of our normal spot arrived earlier so we have a fantistic morning and the size were really good. Plan to go tommorrw again subject to my wify approval since she starts to complain the time I stay home. Will take the advantage to go as much as I can before she has enough to tolerate my lack of time to spend with the family or else I have to find a new wife.LOL.
Thats a crappie picture..  Thanks for the quick report.  I'll have to go check some spots this weekend!
You look slab-happy in that pic...well done
Sweet!  Hopefully going to get out this weekend for a few if I can sneak away from work.
How come you know I was smiling behind the picture.  Thanks for looking

Aha - since you posted that on OFC, I have deduced that you caught them in Ontario.  And I can see from the background that it's somewhere close to a road.  That's a good enough clue for me; I'm on my way.   [nice fish. thanks for the report]
